channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP -- Q'center Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP -- Q'center Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2018-0708|2024-09-16T17:03:30.561Z -- qnap -- q%27center%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in networking of QNAP Q'center Virtual Appliance version 1.7.1063 and earlier could allow authenticated users to run arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2018-0707|2024-09-16T17:22:44.083Z -- qnap -- q%27center%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in change password of QNAP Q'center Virtual Appliance version 1.7.1063 and earlier could allow authenticated users to run arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2018-0723|2024-09-16T17:43:13.604Z -- qnap -- q%27center%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Q'center Virtual Appliance 1.8.1014 and earlier versions could allow remote attackers to inject Javascript code in the compromised application, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-0724.

item.title: CVE-2018-0710|2024-09-16T18:03:44.775Z -- qnap -- q%27center%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in SSH of QNAP Q'center Virtual Appliance version 1.7.1063 and earlier could allow authenticated users to run arbitrary commands.
